resources.string: Set variable range to plot charts in Smart Calc
Do not show this box next time.
Input help or an expression like 3 + log(4.1 / avg(1,5,-3)), then press Go!

Hints:
* Touch the input text edit box to show soft keyboard or input pad. Slide the input pad to left or right to select numbers, operators or different functions to input.
* Input help (by clicking the life ring button) and then function name or operator to get quick help information, or an expression like 3 + log(4.1 / avg(1,5,-3)), or a group of expressions like
y1*3+4*y2-3*y3==7
y2/2-3*y3+y1==9
y3/3-6*y1+y2==2.4
, then press start to calculate!
* Please remember that equal operator is '==' while '=' is to assign a value to a variable. Also, power operator is '**' not '^'.

Hints:
* Touch the input text box to show soft keyboard or input pad. Slide the input pad to left or right to select numbers, operators or functions to input.
* Input help (by clicking the life ring button) and then function name or operator to get quick help information.
* Input single expression like 3+log(4.1/avg(1,5,-3)), or expressions like
y1*(3.8+i)==7+4*y2
y2/2-3*y1==9.4
, then press start button to calculate value(s).
Input equation(s) like r = cos(θ), y==sin(x) and/or z==x+y, then press plot button to draw 2D, polar or 3D charts!
* Please remember that equal operator is '==' while '=' is to assign a value to a variable. Also, power operator is '**' not '^'.

Hints: * Click the camera button to take math expression photo and recognize.
* Touch the input text box to show soft keyboard or input pad. Slide the input pad to left or right to select numbers, operators or functions to input.
* Input help (by clicking the life ring button or the question mark key) and then function name to get quick help information.
Long click output box to see results more clearly!
Lack of operator between two operands!
Two decimal points in one number!
Does not match with decimal number writing standard!
Cannot find a left parnthese to match the right parenthese!
Cannot find a right parnthese to match the left parenthese!
Incorrect answer of power function operand!
Can not change a no-exist DATUM to any other data type!
Overflow when convert double to integer!
X is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable x or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like x1, xy, xx etc.
Y is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable y or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like y3, xy, yyyy etc.
Z is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable z or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like z2, zx, zzz etc.
U is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable u or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like u1, uy, uu etc.
V is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable v or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like v3, xv, vvvv etc.
T is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable t or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like t2, tx, ttt etc.
R is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable r (usually used to plot polar graphs) or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like r2, rx, rrr etc.

θ is the name of to-solve or to-plot variable θ or part of name of other to-solve or to-plot variables like θ2. Note that if plot variable θ and another variable, i.e. 2D chart, a polar graph will be generated.
Assign operator which assign a value to a variable, e.g. x = 3 + 4 assigns 7 to variable x.
Equal sign which means left part has the same value as right part. For example, x + 1 == 7 + 3 means x + 1 has the same value as 7 + 3 (i.e. 10). Then x can be solved which is 9.
Left parenthesis. Expression part inside a pair of parentheses should be calculated first. For instance, x * (y + 3).
Right parenthesis. Expression part inside a pair of parentheses should be calculated first. For instance, x * (y + 3).
Square bracket which starts an array. For example, [[1,2,3],[4,5,6]] is a 2*3 matrix whose first line includes elements 1, 2 and 3 and second line includes elements 4, 5 and 6.
Close square bracket which ends an array. For example, [[1,2,3],[4,5,6]] is a 2*3 matrix whose first line includes elements 1, 2 and 3 and second line includes elements 4, 5 and 6.
Comma character which seperates individual elements in an array. For example, [2,3,4,5] has four elements seperated by commas.
Plus sign (support complex number, matrix and string) or positive sign.
Minus sign (support complex number and matrix) or negative sign.
Left division (mainly for matrix to calculator x from Ax=b (i.e. x = A\\b), note that first operand is divisor, do the same operation to division if divisor is not a matrix).
Power. Note that both the first and the second operands can be complex number.
Not sign if left unary operator or factorial sign if right unary operator. The operand should be non-negative and will be converted to an integer.
2D matrix transpose, if operand is a 1D vector, convert it to a 2D matrix, if operand is not an array, return operand itself.
Double-quote character which identifies the range of a string.
Bit wise and, which only accepts non-negative integer operands.
Bit wise or, which only accepts non-negative integer operands.
Bit wise xor, which only accepts non-negative integer operands.
Bit wise not, which only accepts non-negative integer operand.
The constant value of e. Note that e is also used in scientific notation, e.g. 1.23e-002.
0x is the initial of a hexadecimal number; e.g. 0xFA36.BCEE, 0b is the initial of a binary number, e.g. 0b0011; and 0 is the initial of an octal number, e.g. 0376.774.
External storage device (e.g. SD card) mounted at folder :
Application data folder in external storage device is :
User defined functions are stored in external storage device folder :
User generated charts are stored in external storage device folder :
Please select expression or answer to input
Please input an expression or help followed by a function name, then press enter.
does not exist as a source file!
Going to replace an existing file (or merge to an existing folder), continue?
Example folder is only for examples. Any change in this folder and its sub-folders will not be applied!
No file found. Do you want to copy example file(s) into the folder?
Renamed file has the same name as original file!
File cannot be copied, moved or renamed to folder or vice-versa!
Folder cannot be copied, moved or renamed to its child!
Renamed file name cannot be empty!
File has been changed, save it?
Please choose program to config its inputpad:
Chart settings have problem so that it cannot be plotted!
Error occurred when read chart file!
Error occurred when save chart file!
More than 1000 points will be plotted. Chart processing might be slow in some low performance devices. If device memory is limited, it may be used up by the points. Are you sure to continue?
Calculating data to plot chart now. User can press BACK key to cancel.
Integrate inputs have problem so that it cannot be integrated!

Note: If set number of steps to 0, adaptive Gauss—Kronrod method is selected to calculate the integral. It is much more accurate for high frequency functions. However, in some extreme cases, this algorithm could be very slow (5 to 10 minutes) even for first order integral. So it is not recommended for higher order integral calculations.
The application folder cannot be created. Users will not be able to save their scripts or view charts!
The script folder cannot be created. Users will not be able to save their scripts!
The chart folder cannot be created. Users will not be able to view charts!
External storage device is unmounted or removed!
Mounting external storage. May lead to calculation interruption.
External storage device has been mounted.
Copying example program files and Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux to SD card ...
Copying Java based Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux to SD card. Please do not switch Scientific Calculator to background. Otherwise, copying may not be successful.
Error when copying files to SD card. User may not be able to read example programs or cannot create program or chart files in the mobile device!
Error when copying files to SD card. User may not be able to use Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux!
You can still copy examples or use Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux by clicking the Copy examples or Run in PC or MAC icon in the main panel!
Java based Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux will be copied to SD card. If you have done this before since last install or update of this app, you can skip this step.

Java based Scientific Calculator Plus for Windows / MacOSX / Linux has been copied to SmartMath folder in SD card. You can now use a USB cable to connect this mobile device to a computer which installs JAVA (v. 1.6+), enable USB file copying and transferring and run JMathCmd.jar in SmartMath folder in the removable USB disk from the computer. If the computer does not have JAVA (v. 1.6+) installed, you can go to www.java.com to download it.

Example programs will be copied to your SmartMath/scripts/examples folder and example chart(s) will be copied to your SmartMath/charts folder in SD card. If you have already done so since last installation or upgrade, you need not do it again.
Example programs and chart(s) have been copied in your SD card. You can open file manager and go to the example folders to read them.
Input Text Same as Shown Name
Cursor Place (number of characters counted backwards):
Hint: if you want to cut, copy, paste, delete or insert an input key button, long click it.
Tow input pads share same name
Inputpad config has been changed, save it?
Calculating now. User can press BACK key to cancel.
Ratio of circumference of a circle to its diameter
Do you want to merge the latest inputpad config to the one you defined? If you want, please ensure that your Android device is DISCONNECTED to a computer.
Do you want to update files in SD-card (including Java based Scientific Calculator Pus and examples) ? If you want, please ensure that your Android device is DISCONNECTED to a computer.
Did you use == (equal) instead of = (assign) for equation?
Note: r must be from 0 to a positive value.
Cannot assign value to anything except variable! Please use equal instead.
Cannot plot more than 3 dimentional chart!
Graph is plotted but graph file cannot be saved!
Press back key again to exit!
Error occurs when copying data files!
Recognizing mathematic expressions. User can press BACK key to cancel.
The expression(s) selected to recognize may not be valid. Please reselect to recognize.
Error occurs when recognizing expressions. Please try again.
Cannot find a valid expression. Please try again.
Please confirm the following recognized expressions. If you are not satisfactory with the recognized result, please click
Please confirm the following results, if not satisfactory click
Please modify the input expression in the input box which is :
Expression(s) are too complicated and device memory is not enough to process.
Set flash mode when take photo
Clear input text before taking photo
Please tap screen to take photo.
Please select math expression to recognize.
Set the source where photo will be taken from
Error! No back-facing camera or back-facing camera does not have required features!
Please type what you want to tell us:
Please do not change the follows:

Now you are entering offline handwriting math recognition mode. Please note that this functionality is still under development. In this mode only numbers, basic operators and limited number of functions are supported. You also need to write clearly and avoid any disconnects or joint strokes.

Now you are entering offline printed math recognition mode. More functions, letters and operators can be recognized in this mode. However, note that we assume user only selects recognition range, connects broken strokes or disconnects joint strokes here. Please do not hand-write expression(s) to recognize.
Do not show it next time
Expression(s) have been recognized and I am now calculating results. User can cancel the calculation by tapping "BACK" key and modify input.
Expression(s) have been recognized and I am now calculating values to draw chart. User may cancel the calculation by tapping "BACK" key and modify input.

Expression(s) have been recognized and I am now calculating results. This may take a while for integration or is very complicated expression(s). However, if calculation still takes long time in spite of simple expression, it could be caused by incorrect recognition result. In this case user may cancel the calculation by tapping "BACK" key and modify input.

Expression(s) have been recognized and I am now calculating values to draw chart. This may take a while if expression is complicated or several expressions to plot. However, if calculation still takes long time in spite of one simple expression, it could be caused by incorrect recognition result. In this case user may cancel the calculation by tapping "BACK" key and modify input.
What you need to know before start to use ...
I need camera permission for math formula recognition and storage permission to save results.
